1.7.name: wordpress/zanox-search-extension
1.7.description:
The plugin queries the zanox web service API for suitable advertising programs and products based on the search query and displayes appropriate products within the search result page.

The plugin allows the configuration of the sales region as well as a minimum and maximum price for products. You can even select specific advertisers and product categories for an optimal selection of products that will be displayed within the search result list.

Additional it is possible to configure how many products should be displayed and if they should be displayed above or underneath the search results on your blog.

You need a Zanox Web Services ConnectId to use the plugin. http://wiki.zanox.com/en/Web_Services#Start_using_zanox_Web_Services
